title: Canada v England: Women’s Rugby World Cup final – live
summary: The Red Roses face Canada in a highly anticipated match for the championship title at Twickenham, which is sold out. Luke McLaughlin will provide live updates on the game. Excitement builds as fans gather to witness the showdown.

title: Nketiah’s stoppage-time winner ends Liverpool’s perfect start at Crystal Palace
summary: Eddie Nketiah netted a stoppage-time goal, securing a 2-1 victory for Crystal Palace against league leaders Liverpool. The win keeps Crystal Palace unbeaten in the season. This defeat marks a setback for Liverpool in their pursuit of the title.

title: Crystal Palace v Liverpool, Atlético v Real Madrid and more: clockwatch – live
summary: Join our writers for live updates on the afternoon Premier League games and other matches. Stay tuned for real-time coverage and insights. Don't miss the latest developments in the world of football!

title: Ryder Cup: USA 3½-8½ Europe – visitors extend lead after foursomes
summary: Live coverage continues from day two at Bethpage Black as Europe aims to capitalize on their lead. Follow our writers for real-time updates and hole-by-hole analysis. Stay tuned for the exciting developments in the competition.

title: Prince Harry says ‘sources intent on sabotage’ behind reports of strained meeting with King
summary: A spokesperson has dismissed claims that Prince Harry felt like an "official visitor" during his recent visit, stating these reports are fabricated. The Duke of Sussex is reportedly seeking reconciliation with his father, King Charles III. This comes amidst ongoing speculation about their strained relationship.
